item.title: Hillary add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Hillary add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Never, never be afraid to do what's right, especially if the well-being of a person or animal is at stake. Society's punishments are small compared to the wounds we inflict on our soul when we look the other way." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Hillary add a quote by Jennifer E. Smith
item.description: "It's not the changes that will break your heart; it's that tug of familiarity." -- Jennifer E. Smith

item.title: Hillary add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "Courage. Kindness. Friendship. Character. These are the qualities that define us as human beings, and propel us, on occasion, to greatness." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Hillary add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "The things we do outlast our mortality. The things we do are like monuments that people build to honor heroes after they've died. They're like the pyramids that the Egyptians built to honor the pharaohs. Only instead of being made of stone, they're made out of the memories people have of you." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Hillary add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "Kinder than is <i>necessary</i>. Because it's not enough to be kind. One should be kinder than needed." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Hillary add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "If every person in this room made it a rule that wherever you are, whenever you can, you wil try to act a little kinder than is necessary - the world really would be a better place. And if you do this, if you act just a little kinder than is necessary, someone else, somewhere, someday, may recognize in you, in every single one of you, the face of God." -- R.J. Palacio
